author: gkbrown
msg: Eliminate singletons so multiple applications can run in a browser.

author: gkbrown
msg: Preliminary updates to allowing multiple applications to run in a browser:
- eliminate Component methods getVisibleArea() and getGraphics()
- update Component repaint() to be recursive call
- add immediate flag to repaint() method
- update TextInputSkin to use immediate repaints instead of component graphics

author: gkbrown
msg: Move alert button styles into AlertSkin.json resources file. Add image resource names to this file as well.

author: gkbrown
msg: Add Alert.json for localizing alert resources. Extract alert option button styles into external style file. Trim whitespace in Explorer project.
